title: Review and update README to match actual setup process
description: README instructions don't match actual setup. setup.sh exists but isn't mentioned. Need to update Installation section to lead with automated setup script and fix discrepancies around venv, .mcp.json generation, and directory creation.

title: Fix markdown lint violations in README
description: README has 562 markdown lint violations (MD001, MD022, MD025, MD029, MD031, MD032, MD049). These are mostly pre-existing issues with heading structure, spacing around code blocks/lists, and inconsistent emphasis. Need comprehensive cleanup.

title: Improve answer_question output to hide intermediate search results
description: Currently answer_question shows all 10 semantic search results in the conversation. Should only show the final answer with relevant file paths. Hide intermediate search results from user but include file paths in final response for reference.

title: Improve MCP tools documentation in README
description: README has brief one-line descriptions for 13 MCP tools but lacks clear explanations of use cases, differences between tools (especially semantic_search vs answer_question), what each returns, and when to use which. Need comprehensive tool reference section with examples and use cases.
